comment: по клику на терминал с зеленым шариком в панели

languages.text: В светящемся зеленом шаре на устройстве вы краем глаза замечаете отражения людей, которых здесь нет. Они смотрят на вас с любопытством и страхом.
Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.
languages.original_text: В светящемся зеленом шаре на устройстве вы краем глаза замечаете отражения людей, которых здесь нет. Они смотрят на вас с любопытством и страхом.

traits.locale_text: With the corner of your eye, you can see the reflections of the people who are not present here inside a glowing green ball mounted on the contraption. They look at you with curiosity and fear.
With the corner of your eye, you can see the reflections of the people who are not present here inside a glowing green ball mounted on the contraption. They look at you with curiosity and fear.
Out of the corner of your eye, you can see the reflections of the people who are not here inside a glowing green ball mounted on the contraption. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.
Out of the corner of your eye, you can see the reflections of the people who are not here inside a glowing green ball mounted on the contraption. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.
Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.
Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

languages.text: Du coin de l'œil, vous apercevez les reflets de gens qui ne sont pas là dans une boule verte et luisante fixée sur l'appareil. Ils vous regardent avec une curiosité mêlée de crainte.
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

traits.locale_text: Du coin de l'œil, vous apercevez les reflets de gens qui ne sont pas là dans une boule verte et luisante fixée sur l'appareil. Ils vous regardent avec une curiosité mêlée de crainte.

languages.text: Por el rabillo del ojo, en el interior de una esfera verde brillante engastada en el mecanismo, ves los reflejos de gente que no está aquí . Te miran con curiosidad y temor.
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

traits.locale_text: Por el rabillo del ojo, ves los reflejos de gente que no está aquí en el interior de una esfera verde brillante engastada en el mecanismo. Te miran con tanta curiosidad como miedo.

languages.text: 你通过眼角的余光，看到这个装置发光的绿色球体表面反射出来很多人的倒影。那些倒影此刻并不存在于这个房间，正以好奇而恐惧的目光打量着你。
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

traits.locale_text: 你通过眼角的余光，看到这个装置发光的绿色球体表面反射出来很多人的倒影。那些倒影此刻并不存在于这个房间，正以好奇而恐惧的目光打量着你。

languages.text: 視界の端、装置に取り付けられた緑色に光る球体の中に、ここにいない人々の姿が映っているのが見える。彼らは不思議そうに、そして恐ろしげにあなたを見ている。
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

traits.locale_text: 視界の端、装置に取り付けられた緑色に光る球体の中に、ここにいない人々の姿が映っているのが見える。彼らは不思議そうに、そして恐ろしげにあなたを見ている。

languages.text: Aus dem Augenwinkel siehst du in der leuchtenden grünen Kugel auf der Apparatur die Reflexionen der Personen, die nicht hier sind. Sie blicken dich verwundert und verängstigt an.
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.

traits.locale_text: Aus dem Augenwinkel siehst du in der leuchtenden grünen Kugel auf der Apparatur die Reflexionen der Personen, die nicht hier sind. Sie blicken dich verwundert und verängstigt an.

languages.text: Gözünün kenarıyla, zımbırtının üstündeki parlak yeşil kürenin içine bakıyor ve burada olmayan insanların yansımalarını görüyorsun. Merakla ve korkuyla sana bakıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Out of the corner of your eye, inside the glowing green orb mounted on the contraption, you can see the reflections of people who are not here. They are looking at you curiously and fearfully.
